target_area: Las Vegas / Henderson / North Las Vegas, NV
source: LinkedIn via Google, CBRE.com, Colliers.com, Gatski Commercial, Company Websites, RocketReach patterns, ZoomInfo references

email_pattern_sources.gatskicommercial.com: info@gatskicommercial.com confirmed on website; individual pattern first.last@gatskicommercial.com

notes: Emails marked 'pattern_derived' use the company's confirmed email format applied to the verified name. Emails marked 'direct_found' were found directly on websites or public postings. Per VendTech rules: avoid Strip locations (monopoly), target 50+ employee buildings, focus on warehouses/distribution, office parks, business parks.

prospects.title: Director, Property Management
prospects.properties_managed: Multiple Class A/B office buildings across Southern Nevada
prospects.notes: Director level at CBRE LV - manages portfolio of commercial properties. Phone confirmed from CBRE website. CBRE manages some of the largest office buildings in Southern NV. One contact = multiple buildings.

prospects.title: Managing Director of Property Management
prospects.company_type: Local Property Management Firm (Lincoln Property Company affiliate)
prospects.properties_managed: 4755 Dean Martin Dr - manages multiple commercial properties across Las Vegas
prospects.notes: Managing Director - top decision maker for all Gatski managed properties. Gatski is a major local player affiliated with Lincoln Property Company. One of the most connected property management leaders in LV market. General email: info@gatskicommercial.com

prospects.title: Vice President, Property Management
prospects.properties_managed: Green Valley Corporate Center, multiple commercial properties in Henderson/Las Vegas area
prospects.notes: VP of Property Management at American Nevada Company (a Greenspun Company). CPM and ARM certified. Manages major commercial properties in Henderson. 5.6K+ LinkedIn followers - very connected. Henderson location = perfect for Kande VendTech route efficiency.

prospects.title: Senior Property Manager
prospects.properties_managed: Commercial office buildings in Las Vegas
prospects.notes: Senior Property Manager since Jan 2024. Manages commercial office buildings. Direct decision maker for amenity services.

prospects.title: Commercial Property Manager
prospects.properties_managed: Commercial properties managed by Lincoln Harris in LV market
prospects.notes: 200+ LinkedIn followers. Lincoln Harris CSG is a major commercial property management firm. Direct property manager = decision maker for amenity services in managed buildings.

prospects.title: Property Manager
prospects.properties_managed: Mark IV Capital commercial portfolio - office, industrial, mixed-use
prospects.notes: 400+ LinkedIn followers. Mark IV Capital is a private commercial real estate development and investment company. Also found on RocketReach. Manages significant commercial portfolio in LV.

prospects.title: Senior Property Manager
prospects.company_type: Global Industrial REIT - Warehouses & Distribution Centers
prospects.properties_managed: Prologis industrial/warehouse portfolio in Las Vegas - millions of sq ft
prospects.notes: TIER 1 per VendTech rules - Warehouses/Distribution Centers are 24/7, recession-resistant. Prologis is the world's largest industrial REIT. Phone is Prologis LV office at 3883 Howard Hughes Parkway, Suite 850. Senior PM = direct decision maker.

prospects.title: Senior Property Manager
prospects.company_type: Global Industrial REIT - Warehouses & Distribution Centers
prospects.properties_managed: Prologis industrial properties in Las Vegas market
prospects.notes: Listed on USGBC (US Green Building Council). Senior Property Manager at Prologis Las Vegas. Same TIER 1 warehouse/distribution play. Complementary contact to Amanda Comatov - may manage different properties.

prospects.title: Commercial Property Manager
prospects.company_type: Global Industrial REIT - Warehouses & Distribution Centers
prospects.properties_managed: Prologis commercial/industrial properties
prospects.notes: Found on RocketReach. Previously at CIP. Commercial Property Manager at Prologis Las Vegas. Third Prologis contact = good coverage of their massive Las Vegas portfolio.

prospects.title: Property Manager
prospects.properties_managed: Colliers managed commercial properties in Las Vegas
prospects.notes: Listed on Colliers website as Property Manager for Las Vegas office. Phone is Juan Rose's (Managing Director) number. Colliers manages significant commercial portfolio in LV. Contact page: colliers.com/en/experts/jessica-heath

prospects.title: Senior Property Manager
prospects.properties_managed: Cushman & Wakefield managed commercial properties in Las Vegas
prospects.notes: Senior Property Manager at Cushman & Wakefield Las Vegas. C&W is actively hiring for Commercial PM in LV = growing portfolio. Key decision maker for amenity services.

prospects.title: Commercial Property Manager, ACoM, CPM Candidate
prospects.properties_managed: Medical office buildings and healthcare facilities
prospects.notes: 560+ LinkedIn followers. CPM Candidate, ACoM certified. Healthcare properties = TIER 1 per VendTech rules (hospital waiting areas, medical buildings). Large medical office buildings with high foot traffic are excellent vending locations.

prospects.title: Broker / Owner - CPM
prospects.properties_managed: Commercial properties under SKR management; previously Senior PM at American Nevada Company
prospects.notes: 710+ LinkedIn followers. CPM certified. Owns her own commercial property management firm. Previously Senior Property Manager at American Nevada Company and Voit Real Estate. Deep local connections. As owner, she's the ultimate decision maker.

prospects.title: Commercial Property Manager
prospects.properties_managed: Commercial properties in Henderson/Las Vegas area
prospects.notes: 140+ LinkedIn followers. Based in Henderson = excellent for route efficiency. SVN is a national commercial real estate brand. Commercial PM = direct decision maker for building amenities.

prospects.title: Commercial Real Estate Broker / Property Manager
prospects.properties_managed: Commercial properties under Kairo management
prospects.notes: 1.3K+ LinkedIn followers - very well connected. Previously at LOGIC Commercial Real Estate. 4+ years as Commercial Property Manager. Broad network = referral potential.

prospects.title: Sr. Facilities Manager
prospects.properties_managed: TELUS International Las Vegas office/facility
prospects.notes: 380+ LinkedIn followers. TELUS International is a large employer in LV (100+ employees). Corporate facility with break rooms = excellent vending location. Sr. Facilities Manager = direct decision maker for amenity/refreshment services.

prospects.title: Regional Facilities Manager
prospects.properties_managed: Freedom Forever Las Vegas regional facility/warehouse
prospects.notes: Regional Facilities Manager - manages warehouse and office operations. Previous experience as Warehouse Manager at vonDrehle Corporation (12+ years in LV). Freedom Forever has 100+ employees in LV. Warehouse with break rooms = TIER 1 per VendTech rules.

prospects.title: Regional Manager, Facilities Services
prospects.properties_managed: Walmart distribution center / facilities in Las Vegas region
prospects.notes: 530+ LinkedIn followers. Walmart distribution centers in NV have 500+ employees, multi-shift, 24/7 operations. This is a TIER 1 warehouse/distribution target per VendTech rules. Regional Manager = authority over facilities decisions across multiple locations.

prospects.title: Regional Warehouse Manager, West
prospects.properties_managed: AVI-SPL Western region warehouse facility
prospects.notes: 670+ LinkedIn followers, GLS certified. AVI-SPL is one of the largest AV integrators globally. Regional warehouse = 50+ employees with break room. Regional role means possible access to multiple facilities.

prospects.title: Warehouse Manager
prospects.properties_managed: USABlueBook Las Vegas warehouse/distribution center
prospects.notes: 590+ LinkedIn followers. USABlueBook is a major distribution company. Warehouse with multiple employees and break rooms. Manager = decision maker for break room amenities.

prospects.title: President / CEO
prospects.company: Gatski Commercial / Sperry Commercial Global Affiliates
prospects.properties_managed: 4755 Dean Martin Dr - multiple commercial properties across Las Vegas
prospects.notes: CEO of Gatski Commercial - the top decision maker. Email confirmed on Sperry CGA website (sperrycga.com/people). Alternative general email: info@gatskicommercial.com. Gatski manages substantial commercial portfolio in LV. A yes from Frank = multiple buildings.

prospects.title: Management / Operations
prospects.location: 5725 S Valley View Blvd, Suite 7, Las Vegas, NV 89118
prospects.properties_managed: Corporate Coworking Las Vegas location
prospects.notes: Email and phone confirmed from LinkedIn company page. Coworking space near the Strip with daily foot traffic of 50+ remote workers/entrepreneurs. Break areas need refreshment options. Near S Valley View = not on the Strip itself.

prospects.title: Property Manager
prospects.properties_managed: American Nevada Company commercial properties
prospects.notes: Found via ZoomInfo with @americannevada.com email domain confirmed. American Nevada Company is a multi-award-winning RE developer and commercial property management firm established in 1972 (Greenspun Company). Manages Green Valley Corporate Center and other Henderson properties. Second contact at ANC (with Natalie Stagnitta as VP).

prospects.title: Managing Director, Las Vegas Brokerage
prospects.properties_managed: Colliers Las Vegas office - oversees property management portfolio
prospects.notes: Managing Director of Colliers Las Vegas. Phone confirmed from Colliers website. As MD, he oversees the entire LV operation including property management. Gatekeeper to all Colliers-managed buildings.

prospects.title: Director, Asset Management
prospects.company: Mark IV Capital (previously at Kingsbarn Realty Capital)
prospects.properties_managed: Mark IV Capital commercial portfolio
prospects.notes: Found via ZoomInfo at Kingsbarn Realty Capital (2021-2024), listed as Asset Manager at Mark IV Capital. Director level = strong decision-making authority for property amenities. Mark IV Capital develops and manages commercial RE in LV.

prospects.title: Property Manager
prospects.properties_managed: Gatski Commercial managed properties
prospects.notes: Found via ZoomInfo Gatski employee directory. Second Gatski contact (after Alicia Russo). Property Manager = direct decision maker for individual buildings. General email: info@gatskicommercial.com

prospects.title: Regional Construction Manager (prev. Director of Operations, Property Manager)
prospects.company_type: REIT - Manufactured Home Communities / RV Resorts
prospects.properties_managed: Equity LifeStyle Properties in Las Vegas region - multiple communities
prospects.notes: 590+ LinkedIn followers. Previous titles include Property Manager, Senior Tenant Coordinator, and Director of Operations. ELS manages multiple communities in LV metro. LinkedIn connection needed for email. Large captive resident populations.

prospects.title: Commercial Real Estate Developer and Owner, Property Manager
prospects.properties_managed: B&D Property Management portfolio in Henderson
prospects.notes: 830+ LinkedIn followers. Owner of B&D Property Management and B&D Hospitality Management. Henderson-based = excellent geography. As owner, he IS the decision maker. LinkedIn connection needed for email. Self-employed = approachable, no corporate gatekeeping.

outreach_strategy.tier_1_immediate: Leads 1-3, 7-9, 18, 21: Portfolio managers (CBRE, Gatski, American Nevada, Prologis, Walmart). One yes = multiple buildings. Start with gift basket drop-off at their offices.
outreach_strategy.tier_2_high_value: Leads 4-6, 10-12, 16-17, 23-24, 26: Individual building/facility managers. Direct decision makers. Pop-in visits + gift baskets.
outreach_strategy.tier_3_network: Leads 13-15, 19-20, 22, 25: Good leads but may need more qualification. Email outreach + follow-up calls.
outreach_strategy.tier_4_linkedin_first: Leads 27-28: Need LinkedIn connection for email. Connect with personalized message about refreshment services.
outreach_strategy.language_reminder: Per VendTech rules: NEVER say 'vending machine'. Use 'smart market', 'amenity', or 'refreshment service'. Don't pitch on first visit - build relationship.
